Sns.Message: This is always a string! But it could (and likely will) be a JSON structure captured in this string. That JSON-string could, for example, represent the UPSTREAM event/notification message from the AWS service to which this SNS service is subscribed. For example, a s3 bucket object event. In Python we convert to JSON/dict() via json.loads(aStr)[0]
Sns.Subject: TestInvoke
